channel.title: Adding bank tabs for items :D
channel.description: i'm not quite sure how to go about adding bank tabs. i have the <><> but not the box with the "+" that you slide the items into to make new tabs. is this an easy thing to do or tough? if its a tougher thing to do i wont bother with it, its not a big deal. i was just curious and if i can do it i will. i dont even know where to look lol. i just need a little "push" and i can go for it.

item.title: Adding bank tabs for items :D
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

i’m not quite sure how to go about adding bank tabs. i have the <><> but not the box with the “+” that you slide the items into to make new tabs. is this an easy thing to do or tough? if its a tougher thing to do i wont bother with it, its not a big deal. i was just curious and if i can do it i will. i dont even know where to look lol. i just need a little “push” and i can go for it.
